original_text: The Lord also shall roar out of Zion, and utter his voice from Jerusalem; and the heavens and the earth shall shake: but the Lord will be the hope of his people, and the strength of the children of Israel.
korean_text: 여호와께서 시온에서 부르짖고 예루살렘에서 목소리를 내시리니 하늘과 땅이 진동하리로다 그러나 여호와께서 그의 백성의 피난처, 이스라엘 자손의 산성이 되시리로다

sentences.original_text: The Lord also shall roar out of Zion
and utter his voice from Jerusalem
and the heavens and the earth shall shake
but the Lord will be the hope of his people
and the strength of the children of Israel
